condiciones_uso_sitio: Terms of use of the website
terminos_intro_2: By using the site, you agree to these terms.
definiciones_intro: The following terms are used throughout this document.
def_sitio: The digital platform accessible by the user.
def_usuario: Any person who accesses the site.
def_cliente: A person who makes a purchase on the site.
def_cuenta: The individual profile created on the site.
def_contenido: All information published on the site.
def_condiciones: Legal terms for using the site.

limitacion_p2: Use of the site is at your own risk.

informacion_datos_personales: In this privacy policy, we explain how we collect, use, and protect the personal data you provide.
privacidad_intro_1: Your privacy is very important to us.
privacidad_intro_2: We want you to be clear about how we handle your personal information.
recopilacion_datos_p1: We collect personal information when you interact with our website, make a purchase, or register on our platform.
uso_informacion_p1: The information we collect is used to process your orders, improve our services, send communications, and prevent fraud.
compartir_informacion_p1: We may share your information with third parties who help us carry out these processes, such as service providers or business partners.
seguridad_datos_p1: We implement security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access.
seguridad_datos_p2: However, you should be aware that no data transmission over the Internet is completely secure.
derechos_usuario_p1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time.
cambios_politica_p1: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page.
